mapper.insert: insert jdb_card( card_id, card_name, card_img, card_price, card_detail, add_time, update_time )values( #{cardId}, #{cardName}, #{cardImg}, #{cardPrice}, #{cardDetail}, #{addTime}, #{updateTime} )
mapper.update: update jdb_card set card_name=#{card_name}, card_img=#{card_img}, card_price=#{card_price}, card_detail=#{card_detail}, update_time=#{updateTime} where card_id=#{cardId}
mapper.select: select card_id as cardId, card_name as cardName, card_img as cardImg, card_price as cardPrice, card_detail as cardDetail, add_time as addTime, update_time as updateTime from jdb_card where card_id=#{id}
